Tag.description: Creates a key-value pair for a specific resource.

Key.description: The name assigned to the tag that you create.
Key.markdownDescription:
The name assigned to the tag that you create.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: Contains one or more values that you assigned to the key name you create.
Value.markdownDescription:
Contains one or more values that you assigned to the key name you create.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
Creates a key-value pair for a specific resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Description.description: A textual description for the agreement.
Description.markdownDescription:
A textual description for the agreement.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 200  
Pattern: ^[\w\- ]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

ServerId.description: A unique identifier for the server.
ServerId.markdownDescription:
A unique identifier for the server.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 19  
Maximum Length: 19  
Pattern: ^s-([0-9a-f]{17})$  
Update requires: Replacement

LocalProfileId.description: A unique identifier for the local profile.
LocalProfileId.markdownDescription:
A unique identifier for the local profile.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 19  
Maximum Length: 19  
Pattern: ^p-([0-9a-f]{17})$  
Update requires: No interruption

PartnerProfileId.description: A unique identifier for the partner profile.
PartnerProfileId.markdownDescription:
A unique identifier for the partner profile.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 19  
Maximum Length: 19  
Pattern: ^p-([0-9a-f]{17})$  
Update requires: No interruption

BaseDirectory.description: Specifies the base directory for the agreement.
BaseDirectory.markdownDescription:
Specifies the base directory for the agreement.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Pattern: ^$|/.*  
Update requires: No interruption

AccessRole.description: Specifies the access role for the agreement.
AccessRole.markdownDescription:
Specifies the access role for the agreement.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: arn:.*role/.*  
Update requires: No interruption

Status.description: Specifies the status of the agreement.
Status.markdownDescription:
Specifies the status of the agreement.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ACTIVE | INACTIVE  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: Key-value pairs that can be used to group and search for agreements. Tags are metadata attached to agreements for any purpose.
Tags.markdownDescription:
Key-value pairs that can be used to group and search for agreements. Tags are metadata attached to agreements for any purpose.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

AgreementId.description: A unique identifier for the agreement.
AgreementId.markdownDescription:
A unique identifier for the agreement.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 19  
Maximum Length: 19  
Pattern: ^a-([0-9a-f]{17})$  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.description: Specifies the unique Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the agreement.
Arn.markdownDescription:
Specifies the unique Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the agreement.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 1600  
Pattern: arn:.*  
Update requires: No interruption
